login: Log in using an existing account
email-login-error: Something went wrong while sending the email. Please try again later.
email-login-success: A login link has been sent to your email address. The link will expire in 60 minutes.
agree-message-part: By clicking {{button}}, you agree to our
team-invite: is inviting you to join their team.
successfully-joined: You have successfully created your account.
remove-team-warning: Deleting the team will delete all resources and data associated with the team forever. This action cannot be undone.
leave-team-success: You have left the team successfully.
members-of-a-team: Members of a team have access to specific areas, such as a new release or a new application feature.
accept-invite: You can accept the invitation to join the team by clicking the button below.
invite-create-account: To continue, you must either create a new account or login to an existing account.
no-active-team: You do not have any active team.
name: Name
delete-member-warning: Removing {{name}} ({{email}}) will revoke their access to the team. This action cannot be undone.
delete-member-invitation-warning: Removing this invitation will prevent {{email}} from joining the team. This action cannot be undone.
delete-webhook-warning: Deleting this webhook will permanently terminate its functionality. This action cannot be undone.
webhook-create-desc: Create webhook to listen to events from app.
events-description: You can choose which events are sent to which endpoint. By default, all messages are sent to all endpoints.
kickstart-your-enterprise: Kickstart your enterprise app development with Next.js SaaS Starter Kit
api-key-description: API keys allow your app to communicate with our APIs.
new-api-warning: Save this API key somewhere safe. You won't be able to see it again once you close this dialog.
no-api-key-title: You haven't created any API Keys yet
revoke-api-key-confirm: Are you sure you want to revoke this API Key? This action can not be undone.
remove-team-confirmation: Are you sure you want to delete the team? Deleting the team will delete all resources and data associated with the team forever.
leave-team-confirmation: Are you sure you want to leave the team? You'll lose access to all resources and data associated with the team.
no-webhook-title: You haven't created any webhook yet
sp-saml-config-description: Your Identity Provider (IdP) will ask for the following details while configuring the SAML application. Share this information with your IT administrator.
sp-acs-url: ACS (Assertion Consumer Service) URL / Single Sign-On URL / Destination URL
sp-entity-id: SP Entity ID / Identifier / Audience URI / Audience Restriction
email-verified: Your email has been successfully verified. Thank you for confirming your account.
confirm-email-description: Please click the verification link sent to your email to activate your account. There is a chance it might have ended up in your Spam folder, please check there if you do not receive the email.
allow-only-work-email: Please use your work email to create an account.
verify-account-expired: This verification link has expired. Please enter the email address associated with your account, and we'll send you another verification link.
verify-account-link-sent: Verification link sent. Please check your email.
homepage-title: Enterprise SaaS Starter Kit by BoxyHQ
email-address-description: The email address you use to sign in to your account.
name-appearance: This is how your name will appear in the interface.
change-password-text: You can change your password here.
change-theme: This will change the theme of the app.
custom-avatar: Click on the avatar to upload a custom one from your files.
avatar-type: Accepted file types: .png, .jpg. Max file size: 2MB.
confirm-your-email: Please confirm your email address before you can continue.
description-invitations: Invitations that have been sent to users but have not yet been accepted.
exceeded-login-attempts: Your account has been locked after too many failed login attempts. We sent you an email with a link to unlock it.
account-unlocked: Your account has been unlocked. Please try logging in again. Contact support if you need further assistance.
manage-sessions: Manage and logout your active sessions on other browsers and devices.
remove-other-browser-session-warning: Once removed you will be logged out of the app on that browser.
remove-current-browser-session-warning: You are about to remove your current session. Once you do this, you will be logged out of the app.
remove-team-restricted: Please contact our support if you want to remove this team. We will help you with that.
stripe-checkout-fallback-error: Something went wrong while initiating checkout, please try again later.
select-a-session-to-delete: Please select a session to delete
api-keys-description: API keys allow you to authenticate with the API.
product-placeholder: This is just a placeholder for the products page.
unlock-account-link-sent: A new link has been sent to your email address.
webhooks-description: Webhooks are used to send notifications to your external apps.
invitation-link-created: Invitation link created. Share it with your team member.
delete-invitation-warning: Are you sure you want to delete this invitation link? Any future attempts to join your team using this link will fail.
accept-invitation-email-domain-instructi: To accept this invitation, you will need to sign out and then sign in or create a new account using the allowed email domains.
email-domain-not-allowed: Your email address domain {{emailDomain}} is not allowed for this invitation. Please use an email with {{allowedDomainsString}}.
accept-invitation-email-instruction: To accept this invitation, you will need to sign out and then sign in or create a new account using the same email address used in the invitation.
email-mismatch-error: Your email address {{email}} does not match the email address this invitation was sent to.
manage-billing-information: Manage your billing information, make edits to your details, and easily cancel your subscription.
billing-assistance-message: If you require additional assistance regarding billing, our team is readily available to provide support.
refer-to-provider-instructions: Refer to our <guideLink>guides</guideLink> for provider specific instructions.
sp-download-our-public-cert: If you want to encrypt the assertion, you can <downloadLink>download our public certificate.</downloadLink> Otherwise select the Unencrypted option.
desc-sso-login: Select an Identity Provider to continue with SSO
desc-signin-with-saml-sso: Your ID is the slug after the hostname.
sorry-not-found: Sorry, the page you are looking for could not be found.
unable-to-find: We're unable to find out what's happening! We suggest you to
multiple-sso-teams: User belongs to multiple teams with SSO enabled. Please enter your team slug to get started.
lawgic-hero-description: Streamline your law practice with our all-in-one client, case, and document management solution.
lawgic-features-subtitle: Everything you need to manage your practice efficiently
feature-0-description: Enterprise-grade security with end-to-end encryption and compliance features
feature-1-description: Automated workflows and templates to save lawyers hours on routine tasks
feature-2-description: Advanced AI tools that assist with document review and legal research
feature-3-description: Comprehensive case tracking with integrated billing and client management
feature-4-description: Comprehensive calendar system for court dates, client meetings, deadlines, and internal events with reminders and team scheduling.
feature-5-description: Secure cloud storage for all case documents with version control, client access permissions, and easy search functionality.
feature-6-description: Create, store, and use legal document templates with variable fields for quick and consistent document generation.
feature-7-description: Track billable hours, generate invoices, manage payments, and monitor expenses with detailed financial reporting.
feature-8-description: Enterprise-grade security with complete data isolation between tenants, ensuring your firm's data remains private and protected.
feature-9-description: Full Arabic language support with right-to-left text direction throughout the application for regional compatibility.
feature-10-description: Define custom access levels for attorneys, paralegals, administrators, and other staff members to control system access.
stats-clients-desc: Clients managed through Lawgic platform globally
stats-firms-desc: Growing network of law firms using our platform
stats-satisfaction-desc: Our clients report high satisfaction with our services
stats-support-desc: Dedicated customer support available any time
testimonials-subtitle: Hear from law firms that have transformed their practice with Lawgic
testimonial-1-quote: Lawgic has transformed how we manage our cases and clients. The intuitive interface and powerful features have significantly improved our efficiency.
testimonial-2-quote: The document management system is outstanding. We can quickly generate templates and securely share documents with clients, saving us countless hours.
testimonial-3-quote: The financial management tools have made billing and expense tracking seamless. We've improved our revenue collection significantly since implementing Lawgic.
faq-subtitle: Common questions about Lawgic and our services
faq-1-answer: Lawgic is a comprehensive client relationship management system designed specifically for law firms. It helps you manage clients, cases, documents, billing, and more in one integrated platform.
faq-2-question: Is my data secure with Lawgic?
faq-2-answer: Yes, we use enterprise-grade security measures and adhere to industry best practices. All data is isolated between tenants, ensuring your firm's information remains private and secure.
faq-3-question: Can I import data from my current system?
faq-3-answer: Yes, Lawgic provides tools to import your existing client and case data from other systems. Our team can assist with the migration process to ensure a smooth transition.
faq-4-question: Does Lawgic work with other tools I use?
faq-4-answer: Lawgic integrates with many popular legal and business tools, including calendar applications, document management systems, and accounting software.
faq-5-question: How do I get started with Lawgic?
faq-5-answer: Getting started is easy. Simply sign up for an account, choose your plan, and follow our guided setup process. Our support team is available to help if you need assistance.
pricing-subtitle: Plans designed to fit law firms of all sizes
pricing-starter-description: Perfect for small law practices just getting started
pricing-professional-description: Ideal for growing law firms with multiple attorneys
pricing-enterprise-description: For large firms requiring advanced features and support
